title: The Ice Queen
description: Aria:He made me live through the hell, just like he said.I might have lost the battle unaware I was fighting one. However, the war is far from over, King.He thinks Iâ€™ll crumple under the weight of his mind games.He is about to find out the most lethal piece in the game is - The Queen. The piece that decides which side of the board will win, and I choose me.Even when I have to become the Ice Queen everyone seems so fond of. Asher:Queen may be the strongest piece on the board, but the victorious is always a King.It is not about hate any longer.But, if it's the war she wants, then the war is what she will get.There is the deal though, there will be my rules or no rules when it comes to winning - My dearest Ice Queen.
author: R.P. Vani
